Botanical name: 1. You must enter either a botanical name (preferably with species and variety) or description
2. You must fill in all fields marked MANDATORY
3. Choose a value from the specified lists where appropriate
4. You must use the country code for the country of origin - you can find the 2 letter country code here:
The only exceptions to this list are:
5. Do not use extra commas as this will create errors when you try to upload the file
6. Make sure you delete the example data and these guidance notes
7. When you've finished save this file as a .CSV and upload it

Chemically treated: ENTER EITHER - details of chemical treatment (up to 100 characters), or "No"
Destination countries: ENTER - at least one country, and no more than 10, in a list with the following format: "UK & CN & IT & FR & DE"
